issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.84 (foreground color: #cc6600, background color: #ffffff, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.84 (foreground color: #cc6600, background color: #ffffff, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: Table header text should not be empty
issues.description: Ensure table headers have discernible text

any.message: Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
